name: Grechen L. George
position: Associate Professor of Nutrition and Dietetics
quote: The authors incorporate their deep caring, empathy, and decades of experience into this book, and share true stories to connect with.  The Self-Regulated Eater reignites a calming joy in a person’s day-to-day interactions with food and self.

name: Raya Almufti
quote: Beautifully laid out and engaging. The simulated therapist/client sessions make the process come alive and help the reader anticipate the common inner conflicts that arise when using your body’s hunger and fullness cues.
